# Sahil Chouksey - Full Stack Developer & AI Engineer

> Full Stack Developer and Applied AI Engineer from Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India. Specializing in AI-powered healthcare systems, LangGraph, RAG architectures, and scalable web applications. Currently building intelligent solutions at Suryavanshi Ventures.

## About

- **Name:** Sahil Chouksey
- **Role:** Full Stack Developer & Applied AI Engineer
- **Location:** Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India
- **Currently:** Building AI-powered healthcare platforms at Suryavanshi Ventures
- **Website:** https://sahilchouksey.in
- **Email:** hey@sahilchouksey.in

## Professional Summary

I am Sahil Chouksey, a Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building production AI systems and scalable web applications. I specialize in designing and implementing AI-powered solutions using LangGraph, RAG architectures, and Vertex AI. My expertise spans the full development lifecycle from system architecture to deployment on cloud platforms.

## Technical Expertise

### AI/ML & LLM Technologies
- LangGraph, LangChain, RAG Systems
- Vertex AI, Google AI Studio
- Vector Databases (Pinecone, Weaviate)
- Prompt Engineering, AI Agents

### Backend Development
- Node.js, Express.js, NestJS
- Golang (Go)
- Python, FastAPI
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- GraphQL, REST APIs

### Frontend Development
- React.js, Next.js
- TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+)
- Tailwind CSS, CSS3
- State Management (Redux, Zustand)

### Cloud & DevOps
- Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
- Amazon Web Services (AWS)
- Docker, Kubernetes
- CI/CD Pipelines
- Vercel, Cloudflare

## Current Work

**Suryavanshi Ventures** - Full Stack Developer & AI Engineer
- Building BRIO Health AI: An AI-powered medical search engine for healthcare professionals
- Developing RAG-based systems using LangGraph and Vertex AI
- Creating scalable backend architectures for healthcare applications

## Featured Projects

### BRIO Health AI
- **URL:** https://briohealth.ai
- **Description:** AI-powered medical search engine for healthcare professionals using LangGraph and Vertex AI
- **Tech Stack:** LangGraph, Vertex AI, Node.js, React, PostgreSQL
- **Category:** Healthcare AI, Medical Technology

### Soundrex
- **URL:** https://soundrex.netlify.app
- **Description:** YouTube Music-like streaming application with modern UI/UX
- **Tech Stack:** React, Node.js, YouTube API
- **Category:** Music Streaming, Web Application
